title: my ban bugged
body:
my account got ban for 20 min for 5 matches i said np cuz i was afk and they remaked and lose 19 lp i said np i deserve it for potato pc 
Then everytime i join the lobby the game cancel the lobby on its own and i cant play again on this account 
can u help me riot ?

replies.body: Looks like you were able to play through a couple of those games finally, is that weird lobby bug still giving you problems?
